Invocation Name: indian states quiz
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Test your knowledge of the Indian states and their capitals.

States Quiz provides a fun way to keep your Indian geography skills sharp.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Indian States Quiz" or "Alexa, open Indian States Quiz" to start the game".

At any time, you can stop the game by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
